dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, um, let's talk about Kazakhstan for a bit. President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, you know, he's really cracking down on something we're seeing, like, everywhere: online and phone fraud.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, um, let's talk about Kazakhstan for a bit. President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, you know, he's really cracking down on something we're seeing, like, everywhere: online and phone fraud.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President of Kazakhstan Kassym-Jomart Tokayev has instructed authorities to strengthen the responsibility of mobile operators, citing Akorda. Speaking at an expanded meeting of law enforcement agencies, Tokayev emphasized the growing threat of online and phone fraud.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's a huge issue, isn't it? He's really pushing to strengthen the responsibility of mobile operators there, which, uh, makes sense given how much of this stuff goes through phones.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's a huge issue, isn't it? He's really pushing to strengthen the responsibility of mobile operators there, which, uh, makes sense given how much of this stuff goes through phones.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President of Kazakhstan Kassym-Jomart Tokayev has instructed authorities to strengthen the responsibility of mobile operators, citing Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. He spoke at this meeting, right, of law enforcement, and he really emphasized that these crimes are often committed by, like, well-organized groups, often from *abroad*, which makes it super hard to investigate.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. He spoke at this meeting, right, of law enforcement, and he really emphasized that these crimes are often committed by, like, well-organized groups, often from abroad, which makes it super hard to investigate.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These crimes are often committed by well-organized criminal groups operating from abroad, making investigations much more difficult.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Which is why prevention is key, right? I mean, if you can't easily catch them after the fact... what are they actually doing, um, to prevent it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is why prevention is key, right? I mean, if you can't easily catch them after the fact... what are they actually doing, um, to prevent it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, he recalled they set up this modern anti-fraud center last year under the National Bank, specifically to, you know, identify and block suspicious transactions. Plus, they've introduced shared liability for banks and mobile operators.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, he recalled they set up this modern anti-fraud center last year under the National Bank, specifically to, you know, identify and block suspicious transactions. Plus, they've introduced shared liability for banks and mobile operators.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev recalled the creation of a modern anti-fraud center last year under the National Bank, which is tasked with identifying and blocking suspicious transactions. He also mentioned the introduction of shared liability for banks and mobile operators in cases of fraud involving their infrastructure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Shared liability – that's an interesting one. So, if fraud happens involving their infrastructure, they're both kinda on the hook?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Shared liability - that's an interesting one. So, if fraud happens involving their infrastructure, they're both kinda on the hook?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! And he also stressed the importance of protecting citizens' personal data and, uh, boosting financial literacy. It’s all about building public resilience, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! And he also stressed the importance of protecting citizens' personal data and, uh, boosting financial literacy. It's all about building public resilience, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is extremely important to ensure the reliable protection of our citizens' personal data. To improve financial literacy and help build public resilience against fraudulent schemes, we must step up collaboration with lawmakers at all levels,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That makes sense. But then there's this other really serious issue he brought up: citizens, often unknowingly, getting caught up in money laundering schemes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That makes sense. But then there's this other really serious issue he brought up: citizens, often unknowingly, getting caught up in money laundering schemes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Another serious issue, according to the President, is the involvement of citizens-often unknowingly-in money laundering schemes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that part was wild. He said people are, like, handing over their bank accounts for compensation, not realizing the serious consequences. In just 18 months, around 50,000 people have been drawn into this. And get this: the majority are young people.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that part was wild. He said people are, like, handing over their bank accounts for compensation, not realizing the serious consequences. In just eighteen months, around fifty thousand people have been drawn into this. And get this: the majority are young people.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our citizens are handing over their bank accounts in exchange for compensation, without understanding the serious consequences of such actions. In the past 18 months alone, around 50,000 people have been drawn into this activity, the majority of them young people.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Fifty thousand? Wow, that's a huge number. So, what's the plan to tackle *that* specifically?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fifty thousand? Wow, that's a huge number. So, what's the plan to tackle that specifically?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: He's instructed the financial market agency and banks to establish, like, an effective system for early detection and blocking of those accounts. It's urgent, he said.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He's instructed the financial market agency and banks to establish, like, an effective system for early detection and blocking of those accounts. It's urgent, he said.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Agency for Regulation and Development of the Financial Market, together with banks, must establish an effective system for early detection and blocking of such accounts,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And I remember, he connected this directly to the, uh, uncontrolled circulation of SIM cards, didn't he?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And I remember, he connected this directly to the, uh, uncontrolled circulation of S I M cards, didn't he?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev added that the problem is closely linked to the uncontrolled circulation of SIM cards.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. He highlighted that this year alone, nearly 100,000 cases were found where SIM cards were registered under false identities. Those numbers are then used for all sorts of criminal purposes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. He highlighted that this year alone, nearly one hundred thousand cases were found where S I M cards were registered under false identities. Those numbers are then used for all sorts of criminal purposes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This year alone, nearly 100,000 cases have been identified where SIM cards were registered under false identities. These numbers are used for various criminal purposes,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, so that's where the mobile operators come back in. He's really telling them to get their act together on regulating SIM card sales and increasing their accountability.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, so that's where the mobile operators come back in. He's really telling them to get their act together on regulating S I M card sales and increasing their accountability.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He instructed the Government and relevant authorities to regulate the sale of SIM cards and increase the accountability of mobile operators for their distribution.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's a big push. He's basically saying, look, this is a massive problem, and everyone from banks to mobile operators needs to step up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's a big push. He's basically saying, look, this is a massive problem, and everyone from banks to mobile operators needs to step up.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Sounds like they're taking it very seriously.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds like they're taking it very seriously.
